name: CX - Retail user journey
description: Customer experience quality foundation - retail user journey

nrqlQueries.query: FROM PageView SELECT count(*) WHERE appName LIKE '%' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView WHERE appName LIKE '%' FACET deviceType SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView WHERE appName LIKE '%' FACET countryCode SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM AjaxRequest SELECT count(*) / uniqueCount(session) AS RequestsPerSession WHERE appName LIKE '%' SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES auto
FROM PageView SELECT count(*) / uniqueCount(session) AS PageViewsPerSession WHERE appName LIKE '%' SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES auto
FROM SyntheticCheck SELECT percentage(count(*),WHERE result = 'FAILED') WHERE monitorName LIKE '%' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO

widgets.title: Failed Synthetic Checks - Verify All Pages

nrqlQueries.query: FROM SyntheticCheck select percentage(count(*),WHERE result = 'FAILED') WHERE monitorName LIKE '%' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO

rawConfiguration.text:
# Page View Performance - Desktop
## All Pages

nrqlQueries.query: FROM PageView SELECT percentile(backendDuration, 75) AS 'TTFB' WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO

rawConfiguration.text:
# Page View Performance - Mobile web, other
## All Pages

nrqlQueries.query: FROM PageView SELECT percentile(backendDuration, 75) AS 'TTFB' WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO

rawConfiguration.text:
# AJAX Request Performance - Desktop
## All Pages

nrqlQueries.query: FROM AjaxRequest SELECT percentile(timeToSettle, 75) AS 'Time to Settle' WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM AjaxRequest SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode >= 400 AND httpResponseCode < 500) WHERE httpResponseCode >= 200 AND appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM AjaxRequest SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode >= 500) WHERE httpResponseCode >= 200 AND appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO

rawConfiguration.text:
# AJAX Request Performance - Mobile, other
## All Pages

nrqlQueries.query: FROM AjaxRequest SELECT percentile(timeToSettle, 75) AS 'Time to Settle' WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM AjaxRequest SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode >= 400 AND httpResponseCode < 500) WHERE httpResponseCode >= 200 AND appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM AjaxRequest SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode >= 500) WHERE httpResponseCode >= 200 AND appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop'  SINCE 1 WEEK AGO

rawConfiguration.text:
# Javascript Error Rate - Desktop
## All Pages

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(errorClass)/count(backendDuration) AS 'Javascript Errors/PageView' FROM JavaScriptError, PageView WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Sessions with JavaScriptErrors' FROM JavaScriptError WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
# Javascript Error Rate - Mobile, other
## All Pages

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(errorClass)/count(backendDuration) AS 'Javascript Errors/PageView' FROM JavaScriptError, PageView WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Sessions with JavaScriptErrors' FROM JavaScriptError WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND deviceType != 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM PageView SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND pageUrl LIKE '%home%') AS '% of Page Views' WHERE appName LIKE '%' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO

widgets.title: Home Page Views by Device Type

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND pageUrl LIKE '%home%' FACET deviceType SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND pageUrl LIKE '%home%' FACET countryCode SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
SELECT funnel(session, WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%home%' AS 'Home', WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%browse%' AS 'Browse') FROM PageView WHERE appName LIKE '%'
FROM AjaxRequest select count(*)/uniqueCount(session) AS RequestsPerSession WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND pageUrl LIKE '%home%' SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES auto
FROM PageView select count(*)/uniqueCount(session) AS PageViewsPerSession WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND pageUrl LIKE '%home%' SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES auto
FROM PageView SELECT percentile(backendDuration, 75) AS 'TTFB' WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND pageUrl LIKE '%home%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND pageUrl LIKE '%home%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND pageUrl LIKE '%home%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) WHERE appName LIKE '%' AND pageUrl LIKE '%home%' AND deviceType = 'Desktop' SINCE 1 WEEK AGO
